exceptions.exn: In environment loop := fix loop (x n : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S n0 => let (p, _) := div2 x in match p with | 0 => 0 | S _ => S (loop p n0) end end : nat -> nat -> nat x : nat Unable to unify "S ?M1414 <= S ?M1414" with "S x <= pow2 (S (loop x (S x)))".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros x H. induction H. - apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r. - simpl. apply Nat.lt_trans with (m := S(loop x n)). + apply IHle. + apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r.
